nodes.label: Graph Initialization & Rendering
nodes.description: Loads graph data from JSON, initializes Three.js scene with camera and lights, builds node/edge meshes, and starts animation loop.

nodes.label: User Interaction Flow
nodes.description: Handles mouse events (hover, click, double-click) using raycasting, updates node selection state, displays info panel with node details and connections.

nodes.label: Network Discovery
nodes.description: Performs BFS traversal from selected node to discover connected network, dims non-connected nodes, highlights discovered edges with depth calculation.

nodes.label: Hierarchy Expand/Collapse
nodes.description: Manages collapsible technical layer hierarchy, handles expand/collapse actions on double-click, rebuilds graph view with filtered nodes based on hierarchy state.

nodes.label: 3D Scene Management
nodes.description: Three.js scene setup with perspective camera, WebGL renderer, orbit controls, ambient and directional lighting, and continuous animation loop.

nodes.label: Graph Visualization
nodes.description: 3D rendering of knowledge graph nodes as cylinder meshes with text labels, edges as lines with layer-based colors, arranged in multi-layer circular/pyramidal layouts.

nodes.label: Interactive Navigation
nodes.description: Raycasting for node detection, hover effects with 1.2x scale, click selection with 1.3x scale, connection highlighting, and orbit camera controls.

nodes.label: Hierarchical Data Representation
nodes.description: Tree structure built from contains edges, supports parent-child relationships, tracks expanded/collapsed state, filters nodes by technical level and importance.

nodes.label: Network Discovery Algorithm
nodes.description: Breadth-first search traversal following both edge connections and hierarchical relationships, discovers connected subgraph with configurable depth limit.

nodes.label: Layer-Based Positioning
nodes.description: Three-layer vertical arrangement (workflow at y=120, conceptual at y=0, technical at y=-120) with circular layouts for top layers and pyramidal hierarchy for technical layer.

nodes.label: Info Panel UI
nodes.description: Side panel displaying node details (type, description, file location), incoming/outgoing connections, network discovery controls, and network statistics.

nodes.label: 3D Visualization Service
nodes.description: Complete 3D knowledge graph visualization application with modular ES6 architecture, Three.js rendering, interactive navigation, and hierarchical data management.

nodes.label: js/
nodes.description: ES6 module directory containing core visualization logic separated into single-responsibility modules for scene, nodes, edges, interaction, and utilities.

nodes.label: js/main.js
nodes.description: Main entry point orchestrating initialization, loading graph data, building layers, setting up interaction, and exposing global functions.

nodes.label: js/scene-setup.js
nodes.description: Three.js scene initialization with camera, renderer, orbit controls, lighting setup, grid floor, and animation loop management.

nodes.label: js/node-builder.js
nodes.description: Node mesh creation and positioning logic with layer-based colors, circular/pyramidal layouts, expand/collapse indicators, and automatic centering for technical layer.

nodes.label: js/edge-builder.js
nodes.description: Edge line creation connecting node meshes, manages edge data lookup structures, provides connection highlighting and opacity control.

nodes.label: js/interaction.js
nodes.description: Mouse event handling with raycasting for node detection, hover/click/double-click handlers, selection state management, and network discovery toggle.

nodes.label: js/info-panel.js
nodes.description: Info panel UI logic displaying node metadata, connections list, network discovery action buttons, and panel close handling with state reset.

nodes.label: js/network-discovery.js
nodes.description: BFS network discovery algorithm traversing both edge connections and hierarchical relationships, calculates network depth with configurable maximum depth.

nodes.label: js/hierarchy-controller.js
nodes.description: Hierarchy state management building parent-child trees from contains edges, tracking expanded/collapsed nodes, filtering by technical level and importance.

nodes.label: js/utils.js
nodes.description: Utility functions for creating text label sprites with canvas rendering, edge color mapping by layer type, and random float offset generation for animations.

nodes.label: index.html
nodes.description: Main HTML page with Three.js CDN imports, info panel UI structure, hierarchy toolbar with expand/collapse and filter controls, and module script loader.

nodes.label: README.md
nodes.description: Documentation covering modular architecture structure, module responsibilities, running instructions with local server requirements, and development workflow guidance.

nodes.label: Architecture Guide
nodes.description: High-level architecture documentation explaining the 3-layer visualization system, hierarchical node positioning, and Three.js scene management patterns.

nodes.label: API Reference
nodes.description: Complete API documentation for exported functions including buildLayer, createNodeMesh, and interaction handlers with parameter specifications.

nodes.label: Contributing Guide
nodes.description: Developer contribution guidelines covering code style, module organization, testing requirements, and pull request process.

nodes.label: HierarchyState
nodes.description: Manages hierarchy expand/collapse state, builds tree from graph edges, tracks visible nodes, applies technical level and importance filters, provides expand/collapse/toggle operations.

nodes.label: loadAndInitialize
nodes.description: Async entry point function that fetches graph_data.json, handles loading errors, and calls initVisualization to start the application.

nodes.label: initVisualization
nodes.description: Main initialization function that sets up Three.js scene, builds node index, initializes hierarchy state, builds all layers (workflow/conceptual/technical), creates edges, and starts animation.

nodes.label: rebuildGraph
nodes.description: Rebuilds entire graph visualization after hierarchy state changes, removes existing meshes, builds layers with updated visible nodes, and recreates edges.

nodes.label: toggleHierarchyNode
nodes.description: Toggles node expansion state, updates expand indicator sprite, and triggers graph rebuild to show/hide children.

nodes.label: initializeScene
nodes.description: Creates Three.js scene with dark blue background, perspective camera, WebGL renderer, orbit controls with auto-rotate, ambient and directional lighting, and grid floor.

nodes.label: startAnimationLoop
nodes.description: Starts requestAnimationFrame loop that applies floating animation to nodes using sine wave with phase offsets, updates controls, and renders scene.

nodes.label: buildLayer
nodes.description: Builds all node meshes for a layer (workflow/conceptual/technical), calculates hierarchy depths for technical layer, positions nodes in circular or pyramidal arrangement, creates visual guides, and returns mesh maps.

nodes.label: createNodeMesh
nodes.description: Creates cylinder mesh for a node with layer-based color, positions based on layer type (circular for workflow/conceptual, pyramidal for technical), adds text label sprite, and expand/collapse indicator if node has children.

nodes.label: buildEdges
nodes.description: Creates line geometries connecting node meshes, assigns layer-based colors, builds bidirectional edge data lookup structures (outgoing/incoming), and adds lines to scene.

nodes.label: highlightConnections
nodes.description: Dims all edges to low opacity, then sets connected edges (incoming and outgoing) for specified node to full opacity for visual emphasis.

nodes.label: setupInteraction
nodes.description: Sets up raycasting and mouse event listeners for hover (1.2x scale), click (1.3x scale, show info panel), and double-click (toggle hierarchy) interactions.

nodes.label: toggleNetworkDiscovery
nodes.description: Activates or deactivates network discovery mode, performs BFS traversal with max depth 5, dims non-discovered nodes to 0.15 opacity, enlarges discovered nodes, and highlights network edges.

nodes.label: showNodeInfo
nodes.description: Builds HTML content for info panel showing node label, type, description, file location, incoming/outgoing connections, network discovery button, and network stats if active.

nodes.label: closeInfoPanel
nodes.description: Hides info panel, resets selected node scale, deactivates network discovery if active, restores all node opacities, and resets edge highlights.

nodes.label: discoverNetwork
nodes.description: BFS algorithm that discovers connected network from starting node up to max depth, follows both edge connections (outgoing/incoming) and hierarchical relationships (parents/children), returns set of discovered node IDs.

nodes.label: getNetworkDepth
nodes.description: Calculates maximum depth of discovered network from starting node by performing BFS traversal only within discovered nodes set.

nodes.label: buildHierarchyTree
nodes.description: Builds parent-child hierarchy map from flat node array by processing contains edges, creates bidirectional parent-child relationships for efficient traversal.

nodes.label: createLabelSprite
nodes.description: Creates text label sprite using canvas 2D rendering with semi-transparent background, layer-based text color, and scaled to appropriate size for 3D scene.

nodes.label: getEdgeColor
nodes.description: Returns color hex value for edge based on layer type (workflow-to-conceptual: blue, conceptual-to-technical: yellow, technical: grey).

nodes.label: initializeDefaultState
nodes.description: Initializes default hierarchy state by expanding root service nodes and calculating initial visible nodes based on filters.

nodes.label: updateVisibleNodes
nodes.description: Recalculates visible nodes set by including workflow/conceptual layers entirely, processing technical layer hierarchy with expand/collapse state, and applying technical level and importance filters.

nodes.label: toggleNode
nodes.description: Toggles node between expanded and collapsed state, updates visible nodes accordingly.

nodes.label: expandAll
nodes.description: Expands all nodes with children in technical layer, clears collapsed set, and updates visible nodes.

nodes.label: collapseAll
nodes.description: Collapses all nodes except root nodes, keeps only root service nodes expanded, and updates visible nodes.

edges.description: Architecture guide explains 3D scene setup and management patterns
Architecture guide documents the hierarchical visualization approach
API reference links to architecture guide for context
Contributing guide provides additional details beyond README
API docs guide the implementation in node-builder module
